description: React hook 'useAuth' manages authentication state using Supabase, providing login, signup, magic link, and sign-out functionalities.

methods.name: useAuth()
methods.description: React custom hook that manages user authentication state via Supabase and exposes auth methods.

methods.name: signInWithPassword
methods.description: Signs in a user with email and password.

methods.name: signUpWithPassword
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password, redirecting to sign-in page afterward.

methods.name: sendMagicLink
methods.description: Sends a magic link (OTP) to the user's email for passwordless login.
